mapper.select: /* employmentExcelEmpList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT HEI.EMP_SEQ, HEI.EMP_NAME_KR, HEI.DEPT_SEQ, IF(HEI.EMP_SEQ = '32', '캠틱종합기술원', IF(HEI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME = '' OR HEI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME IS NULL, HEI.DEPT_NAME, HEI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME)) AS DEPT_NAME, IF(HEI.EMP_SEQ = '32', '원장', IF(HEI.DUTY_NAME = '',HEI.POSITION_NAME, HEI.DUTY_NAME)) AS POSITION_NAME, IF(HEI.EMP_SEQ = '32', 0, IFNULL((SELECT SORT FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE WHERE CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = 4 AND TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CM_CODE_NM, '/', 1)) = HEI.POSITION_NAME), 999)) AS SORT FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO AS HEI LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO HDI ON HEI.DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ WHERE HEI.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND HEI.WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'Y' AND HEI.DEPT_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND HEI.EMP_SEQ NOT IN (1,2) AND ( (HEI.DIVISION IN(0)) OR (HEI.DIVISION IN(4) AND HEI.DIVISION_SUB IN(1,2)) ) )A ORDER BY SORT

/* getEmploymentInfo */ SELECT EC.SALARY_CONTRACT_ID, EC.EMP_SEQ, EI.EMP_NAME_KR, EC.DEPT_SEQ, EI.DEPT_NAME, EC.DEPT_NAME AS NEW_DEPT_NAME, CAM_HR.FN_GetName('DEPT', EI.DEPT_SEQ, 'KR') AS DEPT_NAME2, EI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME, EC.POSITION_NAME, EI.ZIP_CODE, EI.ADDR, DATE_FORMAT(EI.BDAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BDAY, EI.ADDR_DETAIL, EC.SALARY_CONTRACT_REQ_DT, DATE_FORMAT(EC.SALARY_CONTRACT_REQ_DT, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS SALARY_CONTRACT_REQ_DT2, EC.BY_SALARY, EC.NY_RAISE_SALARY, EC.NY_SALARY, EC.NY_DECISION_SALARY, EC.SEND_YN, EC.FLAG FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EMPLOYMENT_CONTRACT EC JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO EI ON EI.EMP_SEQ = EC.EMP_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND SALARY_CONTRACT_ID = #{salaryContractId}
mapper.insert: /* setEmploymentContract */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EMPLOYMENT_CONTRACT ( SALARY_CONTRACT_REQ_DT, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, POSITION_NAME, BY_SALARY, NY_RAISE_SALARY, NY_SALARY, NY_DECISION_SALARY, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{regDt}, #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{positionName}, #{bySalary}, #{nyRaiseSalary}, #{nySalary}, #{nyDecisionSalary}, #{regEmpSeq} )
mapper.update: /* setSalaryContractDel */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EMPLOYMENT_CONTRACT SET ACTIVE = 'N', MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE SALARY_CONTRACT_ID IN (${salaryContractId})
/* setEmploymentInfoFlag */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_EMPLOYMENT_CONTRACT SET FLAG = #{flag}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE SALARY_CONTRACT_ID = #{salaryContractId}

UPDATE CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO SET BANK_NAME = #{bankName}, ACCOUNT_NUM = #{accountNum}, ACCOUNT_HOLDER = #{accountHolder}, ATT_CARD_NUM = #{cardNum}, DUZON_CODE = #{duzonCode}, MOD_DATE = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{targetEmpSeq}
mapper.select: /*getBusinessParticipationData*/ SELECT C.PJT_SN, A.CHNG_SAL, A.MON_SAL, A.PAY_RATE, A.ITEM_RATE, A.EMP_SAL, A.PART_EMP_NM, A.PART_DET_STR_DT, A.PART_DET_END_DT, A.TOT_PAY_BUDG, A.TOT_ITEM_BUDG, (SELECT LG_CD_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CD WHERE LG_CD = C.SBJ_DEP AND GRP_SN = 'SUP_DEP' LIMIT 1) AS SBJ_DEP_NM, C.PJT_NM, DATE_FORMAT(C.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PJT_END_DT, C.PM_EMP_SEQ, A.PART_EMP_SEQ, C.SBJ_STAT_YN, A.TOT_RATE, (SELECT MIN(PART_DET_STR_DT) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = B.PART_RATE_VER_SN) AS MIN_DT, B.MNG_STAT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER B ON A.PART_RATE_VER_SN = B.PART_RATE_VER_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON B.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN WHERE (C.PJT_SN, B.PART_RATE_VER) IN (SELECT PJT_SN, MAX(PART_RATE_VER) AS PART_RATE_VER FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE MNG_STAT != 'R' GROUP BY PJT_SN) AND C.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}

/*getCalcPartRate*/ SELECT A.BS_YEAR, B.BUSN_CLASS, SUM(A.MON_PAY_1) AS SUM_MON_PAY_1, SUM(A.MON_PAY_2) AS SUM_MON_PAY_2, SUM(A.MON_PAY_3) AS SUM_MON_PAY_3, SUM(A.MON_PAY_4) AS SUM_MON_PAY_4, SUM(A.MON_PAY_5) AS SUM_MON_PAY_5, SUM(A.MON_PAY_6) AS SUM_MON_PAY_6, SUM(A.MON_PAY_7) AS SUM_MON_PAY_7, SUM(A.MON_PAY_8) AS SUM_MON_PAY_8, SUM(A.MON_PAY_9) AS SUM_MON_PAY_9, SUM(A.MON_PAY_10) AS SUM_MON_PAY_10, SUM(A.MON_PAY_11) AS SUM_MON_PAY_11, SUM(A.MON_PAY_12) AS SUM_MON_PAY_12 FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_PAY_MON A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.BS_YEAR = #{baseYear} GROUP BY B.BUSN_CLASS

/*getMonthlyCalcPartRate*/ SELECT DEPT_SEQ, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = aa.DEPT_SEQ) AS DEPT_NAME, BS_YEAR, BUSN_CLASS, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_1) AS SUM_MON_PAY_1, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_2) AS SUM_MON_PAY_2, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_3) AS SUM_MON_PAY_3, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_4) AS SUM_MON_PAY_4, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_5) AS SUM_MON_PAY_5, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_6) AS SUM_MON_PAY_6, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_7) AS SUM_MON_PAY_7, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_8) AS SUM_MON_PAY_8, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_9) AS SUM_MON_PAY_9, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_10) AS SUM_MON_PAY_10, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_11) AS SUM_MON_PAY_11, SUM(SUM_MON_PAY_12) AS SUM_MON_PAY_12 FROM ( SELECT A.BS_YEAR, B.BUSN_CLASS, A.EMP_SEQ, IF( (SELECT DEPT_LEVEL FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) = 1, A.DEPT_SEQ, (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = A.DEPT_SEQ) ) AS DEPT_SEQ, SUM(A.MON_PAY_1) AS SUM_MON_PAY_1, SUM(A.MON_PAY_2) AS SUM_MON_PAY_2, SUM(A.MON_PAY_3) AS SUM_MON_PAY_3, SUM(A.MON_PAY_4) AS SUM_MON_PAY_4, SUM(A.MON_PAY_5) AS SUM_MON_PAY_5, SUM(A.MON_PAY_6) AS SUM_MON_PAY_6, SUM(A.MON_PAY_7) AS SUM_MON_PAY_7, SUM(A.MON_PAY_8) AS SUM_MON_PAY_8, SUM(A.MON_PAY_9) AS SUM_MON_PAY_9, SUM(A.MON_PAY_10) AS SUM_MON_PAY_10, SUM(A.MON_PAY_11) AS SUM_MON_PAY_11, SUM(A.MON_PAY_12) AS SUM_MON_PAY_12 FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_PAY_MON A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.BS_YEAR = #{baseYear} GROUP BY A.EMP_SEQ ) aa GROUP BY DEPT_SEQ, BUSN_CLASS

/*getMonthlyPayRollLedgerList*/ SELECT SUM(SUP_PAY) AS TOT_PAY, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = B.DEPT_SEQ) AS DEPT_NAME, DEPT_SEQ FROM ( SELECT A.*, IF( (SELECT DEPT_LEVEL FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE ERP_EMP_SEQ = A.ERP_EMP_CD LIMIT 1)) = 1, (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE ERP_EMP_SEQ = A.ERP_EMP_CD LIMIT 1), (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE ERP_EMP_SEQ = A.ERP_EMP_CD LIMIT 1)) ) AS DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_LEGER A WHERE BASE_YEAR_MONTH = #{searchYear} ) B GROUP BY DEPT_SEQ
/*getDeptList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_LEVEL = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY DEPT_SEQ

/*getPartRateEmpPayrollList*/ SELECT SUB.*, DUTY_PAY + DISP_PAY + JOB_PAY + MST_PAY + CCR_PAY + ANN_PAY + OVER_PAY + RD_PAY + VAC_PAY + QF_PAY + WF_PAY + IT_PAY + RES_PAY + PERF_PAY + CB_PAY + SI_PAY AS EXTRA_PAY, SOC_PAY + SOC_TRIP_PAY + END_TAX_PAY + END_TAX_LOC_PAY + FINS_PAY + SOC_ENGN_PAY + DORM_PAY AS ETC_PAY FROM ( SELECT A.PJT_SN, A.PART_DET_STR_DT, A.PART_DET_END_DT, A.PART_EMP_NM, A.PART_EMP_SEQ, IF(D.BASIC_SALARY = '' OR D.BASIC_SALARY IS NULL, 0, D.BASIC_SALARY) AS BASIC_SALARY, IF(D.FOOD_PAY = '' OR D.FOOD_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.FOOD_PAY) AS FOOD_PAY, IF(D.DUTY_PAY = '' OR D.DUTY_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.DUTY_PAY) AS DUTY_PAY, IF(D.DISP_PAY = '' OR D.DISP_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.DISP_PAY) AS DISP_PAY, IF(D.JOB_PAY = '' OR D.JOB_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.JOB_PAY) AS JOB_PAY, IF(D.MST_PAY = '' OR D.MST_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.MST_PAY) AS MST_PAY, IF(D.CCR_PAY = '' OR D.CCR_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.CCR_PAY) AS CCR_PAY, IF(D.ANN_PAY = '' OR D.ANN_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.ANN_PAY) AS ANN_PAY, IF(D.OVER_PAY = '' OR D.OVER_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.OVER_PAY) AS OVER_PAY, IF(D.RD_PAY = '' OR D.RD_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.RD_PAY) AS RD_PAY, IF(D.VAC_PAY = '' OR D.VAC_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.VAC_PAY) AS VAC_PAY, IF(D.QF_PAY = '' OR D.QF_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.QF_PAY) AS QF_PAY, IF(D.WF_PAY = '' OR D.WF_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.WF_PAY) AS WF_PAY, IF(D.IT_PAY = '' OR D.IT_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.IT_PAY) AS IT_PAY, IF(D.RES_PAY = '' OR D.RES_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.RES_PAY) AS RES_PAY, IF(D.PERF_PAY = '' OR D.PERF_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.PERF_PAY) AS PERF_PAY, IF(D.CB_PAY = '' OR D.CB_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.CB_PAY) AS CB_PAY, IF(D.SI_PAY = '' OR D.SI_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.SI_PAY) AS SI_PAY, IF(D.TOTAL_PAY = '' OR D.TOTAL_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.TOTAL_PAY) AS TOTAL_PAY, IF(D.SAL_TOT_PAY = '' OR D.SAL_TOT_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.SAL_TOT_PAY) AS SAL_TOT_PAY, IF(D.NAT_PAY = '' OR D.NAT_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.NAT_PAY) AS NAT_PAY, IF(D.HETH_PAY = '' OR D.HETH_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.HETH_PAY) AS HETH_PAY, IF(D.CARE_PAY = '' OR D.CARE_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.CARE_PAY) AS CARE_PAY, IF(D.EMPL_PAY = '' OR D.EMPL_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.EMPL_PAY) AS EMPL_PAY, IF(D.INC_PAY = '' OR D.INC_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.INC_PAY) AS INC_PAY, IF(D.LOC_INC_PAY = '' OR D.LOC_INC_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.LOC_INC_PAY) AS LOC_INC_PAY, IF(D.INS_TOT_PAY = '' OR D.INS_TOT_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.INS_TOT_PAY) AS INS_TOT_PAY, IF(D.SUP_PAY = '' OR D.SUP_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.SUP_PAY) AS SUP_PAY, IF(D.SOC_PAY = '' OR D.SOC_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.SOC_PAY) AS SOC_PAY, IF(D.SOC_TRIP_PAY = '' OR D.SOC_TRIP_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.SOC_TRIP_PAY) AS SOC_TRIP_PAY, IF(D.END_TAX_PAY = '' OR D.END_TAX_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.END_TAX_PAY) AS END_TAX_PAY, IF(D.END_TAX_LOC_PAY = '' OR D.END_TAX_LOC_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.END_TAX_LOC_PAY) AS END_TAX_LOC_PAY, IF(D.FINS_PAY = '' OR D.FINS_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.FINS_PAY) AS FINS_PAY, IF(D.SOC_ENGN_PAY = '' OR D.SOC_ENGN_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.SOC_ENGN_PAY) AS SOC_ENGN_PAY, IF(D.DORM_PAY = '' OR D.DORM_PAY IS NULL, 0, D.DORM_PAY) AS DORM_PAY FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO C ON A.PART_EMP_SEQ = C.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_PAY_ROLL_LEGER D ON C.ERP_EMP_SEQ = D.ERP_EMP_CD AND D.BASE_YEAR_MONTH = #{bsYm} WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND #{bsYm} BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(A.PART_DET_STR_DT, '%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(A.PART_DET_END_DT, '%Y-%m') AND A.PART_RATE_VER_SN = ( SELECT MAX(A.PART_RATE_VER_SN) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT B ON A.PJT_SN = B.PJT_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND #{bsYm} BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(A.PART_DET_STR_DT, '%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(A.PART_DET_END_DT, '%Y-%m')) ) SUB
